alert.note: Alert for Green; Hardin; Hart; Larue; Nelson; Taylor (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 7:34AM EST until January 03 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Nelson County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Green County in central Kentucky... Larue County in central Kentucky... Hart County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Taylor County in central Kentucky... Southeastern Hardin County in central Kentucky... * Until 800 AM EST/700 AM CST/. * At 734 AM EST/634 AM CST/, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles southwest of Hodgenville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hodgenville around 750 AM EST. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST/1100 AM CST/ for central Kentucky.

area.areaDesc: Green; Hardin; Hart; Larue; Nelson; Taylor
